title: Snowstorm Ahri
body: So, I thought Ahri should get a new snowdown skin next year. She would throw a snowflake and when she has the stuff  around her ( the magic stuff) its snow. :) Vote.

replies.body: Jethus (Jesus Karthus).  that is the funniest thing i have heard all day

So it's literally like Snowstorm {{champion:15}} but with tails?

Imo No.

Diversify the Christmas skins would be cool, like idk what about Poro Rammus, Jax Frost (Jack Frost from the 1998 snowman dad film), Reindeer Alistar or Jethus (Jesus Karthus).

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=rOEsFIHE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-27T01:12:27.547+0000)
>Jesus Karthus.

Takes too long for his passive to kick in.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=rOEsFIHE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-27T01:12:27.547+0000)
> Jax Frost 

Damn I want this
